name: Smoke And Daggers
description:
Smoke & Daggers is a small fan-made supplement intended to assist game masters in running the Yoon Suin setting with the Shadow Dark RPG. 

This supplement is meant to be used in tandem with Yoon Suin The Purple Land, not as a replacement. As it provides tools and materials to assist with running Yoon Suin, not replace it.

Smoke & Daggers currently includes:
- A bunch of hand-drawn art work.

-A small overview of the Yoon Suin Setting.

-2 ancestries unique to Yoon Suin: The Crabman and The Slugman.

-1 Ancestry as a class: The Crabman.

-Setting specific Gear and Transport options.

-6 Hex Flower weather tables.

I plan to include: More art, some stated-out magic items, and potentially a converted bestiary.

Donating, commenting, or engaging on The Purple Land discord, shows me that I should continue developing this project.

Discord: https://discord.gg/xwGmq8YqDQ
